video_streaming.gstreamer_pipeline: appsrc do-timestamp=true is-live=true ! queue leaky=1 ! videorate ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw,format=NV12,framerate=30/1 ! queue ! tee name=raw raw. ! queue ! x264enc bitrate=40000 key-int-max=1 ! h264parse config-interval=-1 ! rtph264pay mtu=65000 ! multiudpsink clients=127.0.0.1:7600,127.0.0.1:7601 sync=false raw. ! queue ! x264enc bitrate=15000 key-int-max=30 ! h264parse config-interval=-1 ! mpegtsmux ! filesink location=./output_{timestamp}.ts async=true sync=false
